message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering purchasing our product. We're excited to work with you. After careful consideration, we're willing to offer you the product for $750,000. We believe this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product but $750,000 is a little steep for me right now. Would you consider $600,000?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. We appreciate your interest in the product. However, we're not willing to go as low as $600,000. We're willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $700,000. We believe this is a more reasonable price considering the value the product will bring to your business.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice.  While I see the value in the product, $700,000 is still a bit of a stretch for my current budget.  How about $640,000? I think that's a fair offer.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. We understand that you're trying to find a sweet spot for your budget. However, we're not willing to go as low as $640,000. We're willing to make another concession and offer the product for $680,000. We believe this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  To be honest, I'm trying to keep this purchase under $650,000.  Would you be willing to meet me there? This would be a great deal for me and allow me to work with you.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. We understand that you're trying to keep the price under $650,000. However, we're not willing to go as low as $650,000. We're willing to make one more concession and offer the product for $660,000. We believe this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business.
